CONCLUSION: Violation of Article 6 - Right to a fair trial;Violation of Article 1 of Protocol No. 1 - Protection of property
JUDGES: Anatoly Kovler;Christos Rozakis;Dean Spielmann;Giorgio Malinverni;Khanlar Hajiyev;Sverre Erik Jebens
TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant was born in DATE and lives in PERSON , a town in PERSON .

CARDINAL . The applicant is a retired police officer who was injured during his service in ORG . He sued a local special - purpose police squad ( Федеральное государственное учреждение GPE милиции особого назначения при ORG Дел Республики Марий Эл ) over his injury . On DATE FAC awarded the applicant a lump sum of MONEY ( RUB ) in damages and costs , and a DATE compensation of RUB CARDINAL,CARDINAL.CARDINAL to be paid from DATE to CARDINAL DATE with an adjustment for the cost of living . On DATE the judgment was upheld on appeal and became binding .

CARDINAL . On the defendant ’s initiative on DATE the Presidium of ORG of PERSON quashed the judgment and rejected the applicant ’s claims . The ORG found that the courts below had misinterpreted material law , and , in particular , that ORG had not been responsible for the applicant ’s injuries .
CARDINAL . Domestic law concerning supervisory review is cited in detail in earlier cases ( see , for example , PERSON GPE , no . CARDINAL , § CARDINAL , DATE ) .
